## Description
Please include a summary of the changes and which issue is fixed (if applicable).

Fixes # (issue)

## Type of change
- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update

## Checklist
- [ ] I have run `cargo fmt`
- [ ] I have run `cargo clippy --all-targets --all-features` and resolved all warnings
- [ ] I have run `cargo test` and all tests pass
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] I have updated the documentation (if applicable)
- [ ] My changes follow the code style of this project
- [ ] I have read the **CLAUDE.md** file (if it exists)
